channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Samsung TVs Hit Ground-Breaking Security Standard With New Encryption Certification
item.description: If it’s secure enough for the National Institute Of Standards and Technology, it’s secure enough for even the most online TV household too.

item.title: Electric Vehicles Confront A Manufacturing Reality: Mass Production
item.description: Expansion of electric vehicles must confront a manufacturing reality: mass production.

item.title: Enhancing Your Workforce: A Guide To Virtual Soft Skills Training For Entrepreneurs
